Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 36th overall pick, by Washington in 2019...
Earned first career win on 5/18/2019...
Had first career hit on 8/3/2019, off Shawn Santoro (MIN)...
Won Cy Young in 2019, going 15-9, 3.41 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/4/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $11,840,000 per year...
Injured on 5/20/2020 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
